title: All built-in targets and props files should add themselves to the MSBuildAllProjects property
body:
The following files aren't adding themselves to the `MSBuildAllProjects` property:

- Microsoft.Common.props
- Microsoft.CSharp.targets
- Microsoft.Common.targets

They need something like the following:

```xml
  <PropertyGroup>
    <MSBuildAllProjects>$(MSBuildAllProjects);$(MSBuildThisFileFullPath)</MSBuildAllProjects>
  </PropertyGroup>
```

There may be others (especially Microsoft.VisualBasic.targets), this list was generated by building a C# library using the .NET CLI and SDK.

nodes.body: I'm closing this in favor of #1299
